content: **knitted headband in drops snow the piece is worked sideways with cables ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #thistletwistheadband drops design pattern ee-792 yarn group e or c + c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l l/xl fits head-size 54/56 56/58 - 58/60 cm width approx 12 cm **yarn** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 100-100-100 g colour 91 grape **needles** drops single pointed needles size 7 mm drops cable needle **knitting gauge** 12 stitches in width and 16 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 7 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
